item.title: SSH Fingerprints, Identicons, and AI Face Generation
item.description: While playing around with SSH and Git, I reflected on how SSH’s key fingerprints are essentially an early form of identicon: The key fingerprint is: SHA256:xtaA8biLm/Jktn9A/j2sty686uosrRtz0GQIFw6nP2s root@bionic The key's randomart image is: +---[RSA 4096]----+ |o +. . | | B . = | |. o o o o | | . + .o o | | + .o. S . | | + .o+ | | E.* .+ o | | .
